name: Carpet Diem
description:
Made in a week for the weekly jam 153 with the theme "Roll"

After years of training Peter is finally ready for his first mission as a bounty hunter.

But Peter forgot a detail : his first operation will be as an intern for the famous Johnny Trigger, and all he is allowed to is dispose of the target's corpse bring it back head quarters.

This would have been an easy task, if only he hadn't forgotten his body bags...

  • Sneak into your target's place, avoid being detected and bring their body back
  • Roll bodies in carpets to hide them
  • Don't be seen with a dead body, and do not let the guards ring the alarm

PS : This is our first game ever, after learning Unity for about 2 weeks, and it was made in only one week. So it may not be much and a bit buggy but we're really proud of it.
